source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
	[Item No],
	[New Item No],
	[Item Name],
	[Item Name2],
	[Short Name],
	[Item Category Code],
	[Product Group Code],
	[Sub Brand],
	[Item Class],
	[Item Class Scheme],
	[Base Unit of Measure],
	[Pack Size],
	[Pack Size Information],	
	[Pack Title],
	[Pack Title Description],
	[Pcs Per Case],
	[Pack Group Code],
	[2Way Item],
	[Container Type],
	[FG Category],
	[Packaging Type],
	[SKU Category],
	[Jar Deposit],
	[Selling Price],
	'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Cust Target]
UNION ALL

	[Item No],
	[New Item No],
